languages.text: "У меня могла быть семья и будущее, полное служения. Шанс на иную жизнь. Меня лишили этого. Решили за меня — кем я стану. Как буду служить. Лишили выбора".

traits.locale_text: "У меня могла быть семья и будущее, полное служения и надежд. Шанс на иную жизнь: ни крови, ни боли, ни сотен смертей, ни тысяч проклятий. Меня лишили этого. Решили за меня — кем я стану. Как буду служить. Лишили выбора".

languages.text: "I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service. A chance for a different life. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me."
languages.original_text: "У меня могла быть семья и будущее, полное служения. Шанс на иную жизнь. Меня лишили этого. Решили за меня — кем я стану. Как буду служить. Лишили выбора".

traits.locale_text: "I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service and hopes. A chance for a different life: without blood, without pain, without the hundreds of deaths, without the thousands of curses. It was taken away from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me. My choice, taken away."

"I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service and hopes. A chance for a different life: without blood, without pain, without the hundreds of deaths, without the thousands of curses. It was taken away from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me. My choice, taken away."

"I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service, full of hope. A chance for a different life: without blood, without pain, without the hundreds of deaths or thousands of curses. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me. My choice was taken away."

"I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service, full of hope. A chance for a different life: without blood, without pain, without the hundreds of deaths or thousands of curses. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me. My choice was taken away."
"I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service. A chance for a different life. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me."
"I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service. A chance for a different life. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me."

languages.text: « J'aurais pu avoir une famille, et un avenir placé sous le signe du dévouement et de la piété. Une chance de mener une tout autre existence. Mais on ne m'a pas laissé le choix. Ce que j'allais devenir et la façon dont je serais appelée à servir, quelqu'un d'autre en a décidé à ma place. »
languages.original_text: "I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service. A chance for a different life. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me."

traits.locale_text: « J'aurais pu avoir une famille, et un avenir placé sous le signe du dévouement et de la piété. Une chance de mener une tout autre existence. Mais on ne m'a pas laissé le choix. Ce que j'allais devenir et la façon dont je serais appelée à servir, quelqu'un d'autre en a décidé à ma place. »

languages.text: «Podría haber tenido una familia y un futuro de justo servicio. Una vida diferente. Pero eso se me arrebató, decidieron por mí quién tenía que ser y cómo debía servir».
languages.original_text: "I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service. A chance for a different life. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me."

traits.locale_text: «Podría haber tenido una familia y un futuro de justo servicio. Una vida diferente. Pero eso se me arrebató, decidieron por mí quién tenía que ser y cómo debía servir».

languages.text: 「我には家族がいて、正義の仕事に従事する未来があったのかもしれません。違う人生を歩むチャンスが。それが奪われたのです。我が何者になるか、何に仕えるか、それは決められたものでした」
languages.original_text: "I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service. A chance for a different life. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me."

traits.locale_text: 「我には家族がいて、正義の仕事に従事する未来があったのかもしれません。違う人生を歩むチャンスが。それが奪われたのです。我が何者になるか、何に仕えるか、それは決められたものでした」

languages.text: “我本可以在家人的陪伴下，踏上侍奉帝国的道路，拥有截然不同的人生。他们从我手中夺走了这一切，他们擅自决定了我该成为什么样的人，该如何侍奉帝国。”
languages.original_text: "I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service. A chance for a different life. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me."

traits.locale_text: “我本可以在家人的陪伴下，踏上侍奉帝国的道路，拥有截然不同的人生。他们从我手中夺走了这一切，他们擅自决定了我该成为什么样的人，该如何侍奉帝国。”

languages.text: "Ich hätte eine Familie und eine Zukunft voll rechtschaffenem Dienst haben können. Eine Chance auf ein anderes Leben. Das wurde mir genommen. Zu wem ich werde und wie ich diene, das wurde für mich entschieden."
languages.original_text: "I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service. A chance for a different life. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte eine Familie und eine Zukunft voll rechtschaffenem Dienst haben können. Eine Chance auf ein anderes Leben. Das wurde mir genommen. Zu wem ich werde und wie ich diene, das wurde für mich entschieden."

languages.text: "Ailem ve erdemle hizmet ettiğim bir geleceğim olabilirdi. Farklı bir hayat seçme şansım olabilirdi. Bu şans elimden alındı. Kim olacağıma ve nasıl hizmet edeceğime benim yerime karar verildi."
languages.original_text: "I could have had a family and a future full of righteous service. A chance for a different life. That was taken from me. Who I would be and how I would serve was decided for me."
